author: Michael Graham
comment: I love this watch face. Perfect for those who appreciate a classic style.  Give me an option to display the temperature and I will buy the pro version!
Its Working on my X01S Smart Watch

author: david dowson
comment: Love this watch face good battery life

author: adisak tivirach
comment: Good analog style and full function

author: Psul Burdick
comment: Cool graphic easy to use

author: Williams me
comment: Hummmmmm

author: Alain Koningverdraag
comment: Useful demo.

author: Eduardo Medina
comment: It's cool

author: Mandeep Singh
comment: Good app

author: Matthew Thu
comment: The Best

author: Matthew Bedee
comment: Thanks for the quick response and the followup via email.  This is my permanent watch face, but having issues w/ turning off the alarm. No matter if the hand is facing AL ON or AL OFF, the alarm seems to be activated. The instructions need to be better on how to set the alarm and use functions. The couple times I have looked things up, I didn't feel the instructions matched the interface I had on the phone.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback.  We double checked the description in the user manual regarding the alarm and it is correct. For some reason, the behavior you describe is not normal. Please contact us via e-mail (fruit4droid@gmail.com) so we can look into this in more detail. We will be happy to help.
Your Cronosurf team

author: Dixon Tse
comment: This is one spectacular watch face, and probably one I would use most of the time on my ticwatch. Awesome high end look with tons of information available in the complicated yet informative interface, it takes awhile to learn how to switch from different mode, but once you learn them all, no other watch face could beat this one. I don't usually write reviews but this is too good to not give compliments. Great work, if there is a paid version with even more customization I wouldn't hesitate to click on the buy button :)

author: M Farooq Chaudhary
comment: This is one of the best watch face available on any smart watch, I've had this as my main watch face since Nov 2016 on my android 5.1 Ticwatch 2 smart watch. After the last Wear 2.0 compatibility update it stopped working,  it's installed on my phone, but not available in the Global Ticwatch companion app. It would be appreciated if you could make it compatible again for those of us not using Wear 2.0. Thanks for your efforts.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content: Thanks for your review. The compatibility with Wear 1.x should be unchanged. Have you tried completely uninstalling and reinstalling? If you still can't get it installed, please contact us: fruit4droid@gmail.com

author: Robert Heard
comment: Too soon to talk about reliability, as I have only used it for a day, but functionality is out of this world - in my experience, unprecedented. If this thing proves to be reliable in the long run, I'm in love... Edit: still genius, months later... a mainstay... file under "can't live without it"...

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Wow, what a nice review - many thanks!!!
As for reliability, I have made very good experience with about 6 different devices so far. But naturally, I cannot claim that it is 100% reliable. I'd love to hear feedback from you on that one day.
Cheers,
fruit4droid

author: Mr B
comment: At last a watch face that I'll keep.  This face is amazing, I love the functions and is now my permanent watch face.  Will upgrade to pro!

author: Ryan Wise
comment: In short the free version is awesome, and once I am able to I am definitely going to buy the pro version. I love the interface and it looks good on the Moto 360 no matter what the occasion is. This watch face has become my permanent face for sure.

author: mohammad shafi
comment: really nice one looks like a pro watch. I don't know how to install  on a wallpaper pls send me the details.

author: Andrew Pridmore
comment: Brillian looking watch face. Very easy to read in all lighting conditions.

author: Hector Puig
comment: It's so nice that it tempts me to buy a smart watch 😒. I would prefer a fully functional widget over the live wallpaper.

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, widgets aren't designed for high refresh rates and do not support graphic acceleration. Therefore, the implementation would have to be very limited/simplified or it would drain the battery quickly and still perform poorly. We are considering a simplified version in the future though.
Your Cronosurf team

author: Michael Clemens
comment: This is an excellent watch for my Samsung tablet. Everything seems to work and I like the wallpaper.

author: Kevin Easley
comment: Works great. But took me a few minutes to get it all set up correctly.

author: Norbert Dupont
comment: App looks great but it doesn't show the difference between the pro version and regular one...

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Thanks for your review. Find the advantages of the Pro version in the Play Store description or in the "About" section from within the app.
Your Cronosurf team

comment: Nice application ,getting better when it's free  :-)

author: Re U.
comment: Cool design but so complicated to adjust

author: Tarik Aman
comment: Doesn't work with Samsung Gear S3. I loved it on my moto 360

reply.author: fruit4droid
reply.content:
Cronosurf Wave was designed for Android devices. It does not run on devices with the operating system Tizen, which is what the Gear S3 uses. A redevelopment for Tizen is already in consideration.

Your Cronosurf team
